properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ni rekkala catuna saranondedan na visrama grhamaina prabhuva Motta pettedanu utsahincedanu migilina jivita kalamantayunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Alasitini ne navidheyatato krungiti nenu papamu cetan, Lepitivinannuhattukontivi nivu mohana kadi naku visranti{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Guvvanu poli egiri podunu nemmadi nondedanani talacitini, Ledu ledu visranteccata ni visrantilo tirigi ne ceritin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Chesitivi mato vagdanamunu ni visrantilo pravesimpaceyan, Manedamu ma prayasamunu pondedamu kristulo tirigi ne ceritin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Siluvapai sramalonditivi karcitivi ni raktamu makai, Lecitivi nivu maranamu gelci kurcutivi ni sansumuga mammu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhangaparaciti ni visrantini yokobupanti na nadavadito, Marpu nonditi betelu nandu ika visramincumu nalo prabhuva{/lang-eng}
